abstract: Peruvian government announces reopening of an investigation into the forced sterilizations of thousands of women during the 1990-2000 government of Alberto Fujimori.
snippet: The chief prosecutor in Peru has reopened an investigation into the forced sterilizations of thousands of women during the 1990-2000 government of Alberto Fujimori.
lead_paragraph: The chief prosecutor in Peru has reopened an investigation into the forced sterilizations of thousands of women during the 1990-2000 government of Alberto Fujimori.

headline.main: Peru: New Government Reopens Inquiry Into Forced Sterilizations
headline.print_headline: Peru: New Government Reopens Inquiry Into Forced Sterilizations
headline.seo: Peru: New Government Reopens Forced Sterilizations Inquiry
